content.detailedDescription: First noticed september 2014 as a bright, multi-colored object in the distance that first appeared to be an airplane but mainly stationary with quick, various directional changes. object would come closer, though still several miles away, and remain in view for several hours. through binoculars appeared to be a 4 pointed diamond shape, like 2 triangles connected at the bottom, with a long line coming up out of top point, all lines were brightly lit, multi-colored.  object appeared again late september 2015 and observed at time of this writing of september 27th.  object has red, green, blue and white moving, rotating lights, they do not flash.  object again makes sharp, sudden directional changes, going up, down, left right and angled movements but always seeming to return to one location in the sky.  through binoculars (25x) object appears to be round with lights on outer edge this time but changes shape.  this is a near nightly observation always between the hours of 9 pm and midnight. aircraft can be viewed flying by it confirming what is being viewed is not a typical aircraft and much too high, big and too bright to be an rc vehicle.  mufon please send someone over with powerful enough lens to get a close look at this object so it can be documented and photographed!!
content.summary: Nightly event, second year. very bright, multi-colored, centered over one location for hours, sharp directional changes.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter, son and i were outside looking at the blood moon toward the east. my son turned toward the west and said "look at that plane coming in". i turned and looked and said "wow, look at that"....The lights were very bright , like a cars halogen headlights. glowing white/blue and red lights too. we watched these lights come toward us, and then stop at the tree line at the neighbors yard. the lights hovered for approximately 25 seconds, then the blue lights turned off and it was 4 bright red lights hovering. approximately 20 seconds after that, the blue lights came back on and they started to travel steadily west, while the lights were turning slowly counter clock wise.
content.summary: Blue and red lights, then only red lights. diamond shape.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to watch the lunar eclipse down the street at around 8:30 with my mother and brother. half hour later i heard a sound overhead like an airplane but it was too low and flying slow overhead. i looked up and directly overhead it was like a triangle/boomerang shape in a light but dark (muted) color than the sky flying straight north overhead. i would say over 1000 feet. there were 6-7 lights and illuminated almost rhombus-like shapes when it was connected. it then transformed and i pointed up to show my brother and mom. only my brother saw it. 
the rhombus shapes disappeared at this time. the lights morphed or squished together into a roughly shaped circle and then went over the trees, disappearing. i tried to run into some clearing overhead to follow it but i lost visual. my mother did not see it that time. i only saw it for maybe 5-7 seconds overhead. my brother noted that he did not hear the airplane like sound, which caused me to look up.
about 3 minutes later i saw it again flying southeast from the north through the trees and then into the open sky up ahead. i pointed high and my mother followed it with me as i ran quickly down the street.
it was barely visible. the lights were nearly impossible to see, but i saw it for about the same length of time as the first, give or take a few seconds more. 
there was the familiar triangle/boomerang shape floating through the sky and i could not hear it this time. i also say 'boomerang' because it was like a very wide v, yet squared out. it faded into the sky overhead going toward the moon. my brother did not see this occurrence but my mother did. and now she believes we are not alone.
content.summary: Saw what i thought was an airplane overhead but the lights swooped inward and broke formation.

content.detailedDescription: It was cool for me and my wife to c this u guys going love  pictures
content.summary: It was cool  thats what i can sau

content.detailedDescription: I was walking and i looked up and seen an orange orb as i noticed it the orb headed north as it was above me it seem to slow down then floated slowly above me as it did that i asked a lady and a child probably around the age of three who i thought was watching the eclipse but was on her phone "are you seeing this not the eclipse but this orange orb" she did not replay then keep going north the further north it went the faster is went once it got to where it looked like a speck it seemed to just zip away also i noticed the lady was on her phone after the event when i looked over at her and she was looking on her phone im not sure of the street address but i walk past this place every day it is on 19th st just about 2 or 3 block from where i live immediately after the event i went to call my friend charlie but when i put the phone up to my ear the phone had dialed my friend riley also i took no video because my phone has a crappy camera on it and while i was watching it i figured it is better to keep my eye on it then try to get video so people could say it was fake now i know what airplanes and meteorites look like in the sky and this was not it
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: An orange orb that was head e then changer and wen n

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the blood moon with my family at about 9pm tonight, something caught my eye to the right when i saw this thing flying fast in a back and then fourth direction, i jumped out of my seat and my son and daughter thought that it was a plane until it flew far out away from us and then flew right back in reverse real fast..At this point my daughter was scared and my son was in shock..My wife was outside with us but didn't get to see it...About a half hour later when the moon was just about full red my son sees this thing coming back from the south and i told my wife and him to start recording ...It stops and just hovers like it was looking at us and then all of a sudden it took off real fast in the direction it came from... it was blinking with red lights all around it self and green on top... the second time when it just stopped and hovered the red lights were still ...It also was making moves that no plane i ever seen do before and at this point my daughter got super scared just seeing that ...
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flying in different directions

content.detailedDescription: Faint star like object moving across the sky. one at 7:43 another at 7:50. way too hight to be a plane.
content.summary: Faint star like object moving across the sky. one at 7:43 another at 7:50. way too hight to be a plane.

content.detailedDescription: Blue orb flew across the entire horizon, freaked me out too. we were sky watching the super moon. it flew across the entire horizon,
content.summary: Blue orb jolted across sky

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my driveway watching the blood moon outside when a loud buzz and humming noise started. then out of the right side a bright light appeared. it came forward to about 500 ft away from me but clearly enough to see that this wasn't anything like an airplane or jet. i watched for about two minutes or so when it disappeared with a flash of light.
content.summary: Was watching blood moon and spotted and heard something unusual.

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed blue orb or craft changing direction within 100 feet left to right at very rapid rate. happened during the eclipse in the opposite direction of viewing angle, approximately to the nw of the bend in the merrimack river. directional changes observed by eye, camera didn't catch them too well.
content.summary: Blue orb changing direction

content.detailedDescription: Two glowing objects flew and hovered in front of eclipse harvest moon. both objects then disappeared.
content.summary: Red glowing objects appeared in front of eclipse and hovered in front of moon

content.detailedDescription:
I was fishing with my father and his friend at a local beach known as monk cwm nash on the south wales coast, we were fishing at night with the rods pointing skywards and obviously we were looking upwards at the rod tips checking for fish takes, it was a beautiful calm and warm summers night  sometime during the night my father called out to me to come over to him about 50 feet away, he was pointing upwards towards the north where he told me to look at the lights flashing, as there is an airport near my first thought was that it was a plane but i soon realized that wasn't the case, it was a clear starlit night and the three of us could clearly see 3 red flashing lights, they were flashing in a triangular fashion in that as one faded out the next would light up and so on completing a triangle motion, we couldn't see an outline or anything just the lights, they didn't progress across the sky and appeared to be stationary, it was impossible to estimate an altitude as obviously there is no reference point to base it on, it was also impossible to guess its size except to say that if it was one craft we were looking at it must have been huge, we watched them for a couple of minutes when they extinguished completely and we didn't see them again although at that time we fished that beach almost weekly.
i know this was a long time ago and my father and his friend are now deceased but i can assure you that its factual, in those days we didn't have the technology we all take for granted now so there was very little knowledge about these things and to have mentioned it would have just brought ridicule, its only now that i'm recently retired that i have taken an interest in these matters, in fact i often watch the night sky in the hope i'll see something again.
content.summary: Night time sighting from beach whilst fishing

content.detailedDescription: On my steps taking pictures of the blood moon event at 8:20pm 9/27/2015 and when i reviewed my pics i was amazed to see there were 2 images of the same object in two different places. i 're took more images to duplicate it but there was no red orb again. i thought it my be light reflection but i have 4 photos with the light reflection and it looks nothing like what was photographed. could not see it with naked eye..
content.summary: Took pictures of blood moon and caught red orb in pictures in motion ( multiple pics on cell)

content.detailedDescription: Standing on my back deck after nightfall. (19:30 local time, 00:30 gmt) thin, high scattered to broken clouds. directly above me at high altitude, i observed a light, that i first thought to be a reflection off a satellite due to the altitude and speed of the object. it was travelling in an eastbound direction. as i continued to watch the object, it started changing directions and speed abruptly. at times it would momentarily come to a complete stop. it moved in just about every direction on the compass at one time or the other. there was no noise, so that help to determine to me that it was at a high altitude, perhaps even outside the atmosphere. i continued to observe the object until the clouds obscured it from my view at 7:53 local time. (00:52 gmt). during the time i observed the object, it continued to move in an erratic fashion, both directionally and in velocity.
content.summary: Varying direction and speed of lights, high altitude

content.detailedDescription: 2 objects in toronto international airport airspace.!!727 entered area within 5mins of event pilot visual is 100 percent probably at radar controls request.!! if asked i do have picture and time of 727 pictures of objects didn't turn out so well.!! thank_
content.summary: 2 objets coming from the east then north.!! objects were in toronto interntional airport  airspace. soon after 727 entered airspace i persume at rader controls request as what the hell is that.!! 727 did a flyby of area.!! visual by pilot is 100percent

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my fiance were working at a house in north walpole new hampshire approximately 11:00am outside facing the east. my fiance noticed what she thought was a bird out of the corner of her eye. she focused in on it and and saw it wasnt a bird. she got my attention and pointed to it. i saw the orb as well traveling much faster and higher than a civilian drone. i am guessing 500+ mph. we both noticed there were no wings and no lights and was shiney in appearence. within 30 seconds it was long gone. the coast guard was flying manuvers in the area all weekend from what i understand.
the orb traveled in a straight line and didnt waiver flying faster than any plane i have seen at that altitude.
we were stunned when we saw this thing and didnt know what to think, still dont, never seen anything like this before. so far no one else saw anything. i heard the helicopter manuvers were because of the popes visit to the us.
we lost sight of the orb over the horizon. we dont have any photos or pictures. we didnt have time to pull out our phone.
content.summary: Very fast flying orb no wings

content.detailedDescription: on 09/26/15 at 10:28 pm my friend and i were in the car driving east on state route 303 in windham ohio we both observed seven(7) amber colored star-like glowing objects hovering in the sky in front of us. at first i thought they may have been helicopters flying in formation as we often see in the area due to the nearby ravenna ohio arsenal. upon closer observation i could see that the objects did not have the shape of a helicopter or plane, display the usual lights, nor produce any audible sounds as planes and helicopters do. the objects seemed to hover then move slowly off in a noth-westerly direction. one object was very low to the treeline and shined the brightest. the driver asked if i would like her to pull off the road and stop. being it was dark and we were the only car on a long lonely stretch of country road i advised her to continue to drive slowly so i could see which way they were heading as i felt a bit uneasy and not sure what the objects were or what the low flying one may do if it was an actual "unknown" craft and decided to pursue us. we continued to drive in the direction in which they were heading but eventually lost sight of them as the view from the road was poor due to the high trees. i am a mufon field investigator and also am affiliated with several other cryptozoological and paranormal groups in the area and can say that the area has had it's share of reports of ufos, cryptids and hauntings some of which i have investigated myself. i would also like to note that i have seen my share of chinese lanterns and drones in the past and the objects we observed did not move nor look like either.
content.summary: Driving down state rote 303 in windham ohio at 10:28 pm sighted seven glowing starlike objects in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
At 00:35 hours on 27/09/15 we observed a bright light which was green and white in colour obscured by cloud which gave off a bright aura. the light persisted however it periodically pulsed and moved around behind the cloud. approximately 2 minutes after the start of us observing the event the light emerged from the cloud, it broke in to several separate lights and then quickly merged in to one and disappeared, leaving a green aura behind. we had video footage of this moment.

for the duration of this event, the clouds in this area seemed more turbulent than would be expected for the weather conditions.
content.summary: 5 lights forming a large circle, then quickly merging to one

content.detailedDescription: Nuestra casa esta situada en el parque principal con vista al oeste, en la fecha designada, me encontraba viendo televisiã³n en un cuarto, mi hermana se encontraba en el cuarto adjunto y me empezã³ a llamar que fuera a ver algo, fuã­ al cuato donde ella se encontraba y cuando me acerquã© a la ventana vimos como unas catorce luces blancas con tonalidad azul formando una alineaciã³n como una casa descendã­an suvemente detrã¡s de la montaã±a que queda detrã¡s del pueblo; a medida que iban descendiendo la montaã±a se iluminã³ al respaldo y luego se apagaron. yo el siguiente domingo me desplace hasta cerca del evento, pero no encontrã© nada; lo mã¡s raro del evento es que luego de ir a investigar me despertaba abruptamente en las noches vehã­a el reloj y me dormia nuevamente, al revisar la hora en la maã±ana siguiente el reloj se habã­a quedado parado en la hora que me despertaba abruptamente; esto sucediã³ por varios meses pero no comentã© pues siempre he sido seguidor de ufo y me tildarã­an de loco. no volvã­ a visualizar mã¡s esas luces, a mis amigos les preguntã© que si no habã­n visto algo raro esa noche y respondã­an negativamente. lo mã¡s extrano es que por la intensidad de las luces nadie se haya dado cuenta, la verdad fue asombroso. adjunto foto panorã¡mica de google earth donde nos muestra la distancia des donde fue el avistamiento.
content.summary: Luces destellantes al rededor de 14 aterrizando destras de una montaã±a por el tamaã±o de las luces y la distancia debbieron ser inmensas

content.detailedDescription:
I am home less went to bed down in the bedof my truck.
 upon saying my prayers looking to the sky.
for i have seen and felt there presce telepathyly.
every clear night since 2011.
there was so much activity i couldn't count all of them..
i have seen cars and people vanish around me so many that i have lost track 
witnessed by exwife ,that is why she left me.
it was not until 3:00 am sunday that craft that that looks like a outapus that has male and female that glow they are so beautiful and have such unity to preform airbatitics about out of range of gunfire so they have to vanish there ailments.
also are delta craft that are ours always apear,they are not
aloud to close to any of the ufos.
the low flying stayed to just after sun rise.
content.summary: Many orbis, pulsating. tracking back and forth. delta crafts .Large octopus craft which has humaoids male and female that hang out together to touch the ground.

content.detailedDescription: I stopped at the rest area on i-90 west before exit 196 in washington state, just east of moses lake. i wanted to use my 70mm telescope to video record the moon before the lunar eclipse on sunday 9/27/2015 to get an idea of how i wanted to photograph the event. i set up my 70mm telescope before sunset with my computer and 5 megapixel video camera in the truck parking area as i was driving a 10' uhaul truck with my car on a tow dolly. i parked on the left side of an 18 wheeler at the 4th to last parking spot to block the view of anyone using the rest area. i set up my equipment next to the drivers door of the uhaul truck i was driving and the moon was just rising above the east entrance of the rest area. i waited until it was above the trees and the truck next to me. i began shooting a series of 30 second clips to take back to the hotel and use my image processing software to stabalize and enhance the image. when i viewed clip number 12 at 3 seconds into the clip there is an object traveling from the top of the frame to the bottom. it is only there for about a second or less if you blink you will miss it. i am not sure if this could be dust or a terrestial object(like a satelite) out of focus passing in front of the camera.
content.summary: 70mm telescope video recording of moon with object moving in front of moon from top to bottom at 3 sec

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend told me the night of the 25th of sept. she woke up next to me and said she saw a ufo in our room hovering she rubbed her eyes and it was gone! she didnt tell me tell yesterday in fear of me freaking out. we both have seen other ufo's in our air space last summer flying from the north to the south. she said it was a hershey kiss shape three black windows in the middle with hoses coming out the bottom to the top going all the way around it. she said it was like looking at a xray the color. she seems to b very clear that she was awake and absolutely saw what she said. she drew me and a friend a picture of what she saw.
content.summary: Was in my bedroom!! my gf woke up and saw a hershey kiss shape with hoses coming out the bottom going to the top.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work at 730am and noticed some interesting looking cloud formation and what i thought might be an airplane ascending towards the clouds.  i wanted to take  a pic but had to wait until i was stopped at a light. it was only about a minute later, but i didn't see the object when i took the picture.  because traffic was backed up,i was able to take another photo.This time i saw the object above the clouds. the next time i was able to look at it, the object was gone. i looked at the photos when i got home from work and zoomed in on the object i had thought must be a plane. it just looked like a bright bullet shaped light when it was below the clouds. when i zoomed in on the photo it looks nothing like an aircraft, but looks like a yellowish rectangular. curious if anyone else has photographed something that looks like this.
content.summary: Driving to work,  i noticed some cool looking clouds and a bright object  going up from  below clouds.

content.detailedDescription: While i was standing in my yard at my residence.  i was taking a picture of a passenger jet that was at a high altitude in the air (traveling from my right towards my left or east to west) i saw a small speck/flash of white against the sky, which i thought was another airplane.  as i got my camera focused and zoomed in on the object it did not appear to be a regular airplane, it looked more tubular with no visible wings like an airplane would have and it was white in color.  i was able to take 2 pictures of it before it left my sight.  the object was flying initially a more north to south direction then it turned east towards the horizon.  i lost sight of the object when tree limbs blocked my view.  after downloading the pictures i noticed that it did not have any features of a regular airplane or helicopter and i could not identify it.
content.summary: Unknown object in sky

content.detailedDescription:
My son was the first to notice this object as he was sitting outside. my son called me to come outside of our house to see this object in the sky as it flew traveling from southeast going to northwest. this happened at about 9:15 pm on sept. 7, 2015. my son said it was about 500 feet from the ground and it was traveling at about 50 miles an hour, my son also judged it to be about thirty feet in diameter and ten feet high. i didn't know what this was but i had never seen anything like it before. the object was shaped like an orb, color was bright and orange/red and it had a white light shining at the bottom of the object. there was no sound coming from the object and also there were no planes or anything else in the sky and not even any cars on my street at the time. it only took a few fast minutes. we watched it traveling until we could no longer see as it  became  hidden from our view by the trees in our neighborhood. the object was moving at a steady pace not wavering, i mean it was traveling in a straight line. i was running so fast that i stubbed my foot, a souveneir reminder of that wonderful experience. i was so awed by this whole experience and thought about it for a long time afterwards.
 we do have pictures, they are quite dark, and the light in the picture is white, not orange/red like we saw it in the sky.
content.summary: Red orange orb. my son and i witnessed on that night.

content.detailedDescription:
The events took place in summer of 1978, a saturday or sunday afternoon in june or july. i never recorded the date but it was a warm summer day with blue sky and a few low white cumulus clouds, so the exact date could probably be found from weather records. there was no wind.

i visited speke hall near liverpool with the intention of doing a hand drawing of the hall, so i was lying on the grass west of the hall, looking towards it.

the hall is adjacent to liverpool john lennon airport (then just known as speke airport as he was still living). there were aircraft coming and going throughout my visit. the runway is south of the hall, between the grounds and the river mersey. the object i saw was obviously smaller and closer than any of the aircraft.

because i was looking at the hall roof i was looking skywards and so noticed the sun glint off a shiny object then quite near. it was shiny in the sun and grey when shaded by cumulus cloud. it was silent.

the track of the object was from east to west, approximately parallel with the airport runway. the track was straight and i estimate that it must therefore have passed over the wirral and mersey estuary before flying over speke hall where i saw it, then the path would have taken it on over hale towards runcorn.

i estimate that from the time i saw the object almost overhead, to the point where it became too small to see was no more than 10-12 seconds. if i had taken my eyes off it in order to ask someone else if they saw it then i would not have found it again. in any case there was no-one within many feet of me. there were dozens of people around but i saw no sign that anyone else had looked up and seen it - as i say, i only saw it because i was looking up at the roof while doing my drawing.

i would describe the object as about the size of a rounded-off oil drum or dustbin, shiny and featureless, flying with long axis vertical. shaped approximately like a capsule that you might get from the pharmacy. there was no obvious indication of how it was propelled at such speed.

it was not a balloon. there was negligible wind and the track of the object was straight direct and controlled.

at the time i thought little of it, but thought it must be some secret technology of usa or russia (or perhaps british - it was after all flying over liverpool) there were no drones in 1978! since then i have come to realise that even today i know of no technology that could propel a craft in such a way.

some time in the 1980s i sent a report of it to an author named jenny randles who wrote books on ufos and gave an address in wallasey, merseyside - but she never replied. i did this because in one of her books she described an egg shaped object seen near liverpool.

more recently, i have seen a tv program called 'top ten mysteries and conspiracies' and about 43 minutes into that program is a clip of an object exactly like i saw, but viewed from an aircraft. i have tried but been unable to find the source of this clip.

i make this report belatedly in case it matches with any other reported sightings. since this was a daytime sighting in a populated area it must surely have been seen by others that day.
content.summary: Daytime sighting of fast moving shiny oval craft

content.detailedDescription: My partner and i were doing usual beach walk, i first sighted at approximately 7:05pm i first noticied a strange object emiting some bright red/orange light, it began to decend hovered to the beach and touched down around 120ft away from us but shortly dissaperaed as we approched to have a closer look. i then sighted again minutes after rising into sky and then within a moment it  dissaperaed at an unbelievable speed towards westerly direction.
content.summary: Nt dissaperaed at very high speeds.

content.detailedDescription:
When i was 13 and on my way home from a camping trip with my grandparents we were driving back along the motorway (highway) a55 near babell i think. i was looking out of the car window up to the sky as i liked looking at the clouds and then as i looked over towards the trees i noticed what looked exactly like a fur tree but stood in mid air must have been about 500ft in the air just sat there not moving whilst i was just caught in a gaze looking at it i just kept on thinking and wishing for it to come closer i was also thinking that if it was a ufo then they chose a horrible camouflage as it just makes it stand out. then i quickly turns to my grandma and told her to look and she told me that it was probably just a plane (she didn't turn to look) but i knew it wasn't a plane as no plane looks like a tree or just sits there hovering i knew it had to be a ufo as i have always been fascinated in space and other planets. i tuned back around and carried on looking at it still in the same place not moving an inch but this time i was looking through the back window of the car as we was driving away from the object i tried to take a picture of the object with my phone that i had at the time but it turned out too blurred to see. and just watched as we drove away from the object. the whole experience left me feeling excited and happy and hopeful that one day whoever is controlling the ufos will come out of the shadows and show themselves to the world and help us with technology in all of its forms. 
sorry for any rambling.
content.summary: I was on my way home and layed my eyes on what looked like a tree just hovering in the air

content.detailedDescription: I was a passenger in a car and was taking pictures of another strange cloud anomaly when i saw a chem trail- i took a cpl pictures and reviewed the quality of the pictures immed. that's when i spotted the small 'doves' around the 'con trail'  that's when i looked up again to see what they were and observed 3 of these 'doves'. i took several more pictures and captured them. i felt anxious and excited.
content.summary: These entities appeared to be following a so called chemplane. they twinkled and fluttered around it.

content.detailedDescription: noted at approx 11:30 pm till midnight right above us  .Disk been changing shapes ,then hover at the same spot.Then faded away.We made several pics.
content.summary: Disk ,like a donut ,changing light in the middle
